actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. _Hit:_ 3 (1d4+1) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 11 CON save or take 5 (2d4) poison damage.

special_abilities.name: Flyby
special_abilities.desc: The snake doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.
